item1: ITEM 1. BUSINESS December 2024, following completion Transaction, Old Aptiv merged into Aptiv Swiss Holdings Limited (“Aptiv Swiss Holdings”), newly formed Jersey incorporated private limited company, direct, wholly-owned subsidiary New Aptiv, Aptiv Swiss Holdings surviving direct, wholly owned subsidiary New Aptiv, Old Aptiv ceasing exist. Except otherwise noted, all property, rights, privileges, powers franchises Old Aptiv vested Aptiv Swiss Holdings, all debts, liabilities duties Old Aptiv became debts, liabilities duties Aptiv Swiss Holdings. connection Transaction, New Aptiv assumed Old Aptiv’s Long-Term Incentive Plans its existing obligations connection awards granted thereunder, Aptiv Swiss Holdings (i) entered into supplemental indenture each indenture which Aptiv Swiss Holdings assumed all Old Aptiv’s obligations under each series Old Aptiv’s outstanding Notes (ii) entered into assumption and/or supplement agreement relating each Credit Agreement which New Aptiv assumed all Old Aptiv’s obligations under each Credit Agreement “parent entity” thereunder.
